QuestData.Title: Now That We're Still Friends...
QuestData.Description: Reports have come in that the naga of the Bloodscale Enclave to the northeast continue to kill our people. We thought that you had dealt with this, $c!$B$BI suggest that you to teach them a lesson as proof of our continued friendship.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Bloodscale Slavedrivers and 6 Bloodscale Enchantresses, and then return to Gzhun'tt at Sporeggar in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you paid the naga a visit yet?
QuestData.RewardText: <Gzhun'tt nods to you.>$B$BWe are pleased that you have reaffirmed our friendship, $n. Surely now that you have made our point clear multiple times, their senseless attacks upon our people will cease?
